items.name: key
items.description: Here is a key. It must unlock something nearby.
items.pick-up: You pick up the key and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You place the key in the lock and turn it. A click confirms that the door is unlocked.

items.name: shovel
items.description: A shovel rests against the wall. Perhaps this would come in handy?
items.pick-up: You pick up the shovel and tie it to the side of your backpack.
items.use: You start to dig into the dirt, and soon unearth two red candles.

items.name: backpack
items.description: Here is a small, weathered backpack. This could be useful
items.pick-up: You pick up the backpack and throw it over one shoulder.

items.name: lantern
items.pick-up: You pick up the lantern and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You hang the lantern on a hook on the wall, which partially illuminates the room.

items.name: matches
items.description: Here is a box of matches
items.pick-up: You pick up the matches and place it in your backpack.
items.use-lantern: You strike a match against the box and a flame bursts into life. You then insert the flame into the lantern, causing it to bring forth a warm, golden glow.
items.use-candles: You strike a match against the box and a flame bursts into life. You then light the candles one by one, watching the eerie red smoke trail up the stairs.

items.name: salt
items.description: Here is a bag of salt
items.pick-up: You pick up the bag of salt and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You Step behind one of the shelves and draw a circle using the salt. You then step inside and crouch down, hoping to stay out of sight.

items.name: dried-herbs
items.description: Here is a small bundle of dried herbs
items.pick-up: You pick up the bundle of herbs and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You place the herbs into the mortar & pestle.

items.name: mortar-pestle
items.description: There is a mortar & pestle stood on the kitchen counter.
items.use: You grind the herbs into a fine dust.

items.name: ground herbs
items.description: The mortar and pestle contains the ground bundle of herbs.
items.pick-up: You pour the powder into a piece of kitchen roll and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You sprinkle the herbal powder onto the red candle flames. A bright green light flashes through the room, then they return to normal.

items.name: chalk
items.description: Here is a piece of white chalk
items.pick-up: You pick up the chalk and place it in your backpack.
items.use: You take the salt and draw an intricate pattern on the floor. This looks sure to trap the demon in place.

items.name: red-candles
items.pick-up: You dust the candles off and place them in your backpack.
items.use: You place the candles one each side of the bottom of the stairs.

items.name: rug
items.description: A small dusty rug is rolled up and tucked inside the crate.
items.pick-up: You place the rug into your backpack.
items.use: You unroll the rug and place it over the trap.

items.name: patch-of-even-ground
items.description: This looks like a great spot to place something
